text: Michael Joseph Ryan (14 October 1930 – September 2006) was an English professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for Lincoln City and York City, in non-League football for Chase of Chertsey and Yeovil Town, and was on the books of Arsenal without making a league appearance. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Welwyn Garden City Category:Footballers from Hertfordshire Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Arsenal F.C. players Category:Lincoln City F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Yeovil Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Mike Ryan (footballer, born 1930)
